name: Telling the Stories of the City: Writing Creative Non-Fiction
description: An introduction to creative writing techniques and the personal essay form through which students will explore and develop their conscious connection to the natural-urban landscape. The course will include activities such as field trips, readings, interviews, and journaling to generate the material for personal essays on engagement with nature in the city. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Munk One, New One, St. Mike's One, Trinity One, Vic One, UC One, Woodsworth One
